## Emoji

```````````````````````````````` example emoji
:100:
.
<p>ğŸ’¯</p>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example emoji
:gb:
.
<p>ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§</p>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example emoji
:people_holding_hands:
.
<p>ğŸ§‘ğŸ¤ğŸ§‘</p>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example emoji
:scotland:
.
<p>ğŸ´ó §ó ¢ó ³ó £ó ´ó ¿</p>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example emoji
:emoji_doesnt_exist:
.
<p>:emoji_doesnt_exist:</p>
````````````````````````````````

There are some issues with multi-character emoji currently, will need to investigate more.
